modName: A complete re-texture for Studded Armor
summary:
Complete new texture of the Studded Armor.
This isn\'t a only recolor / saturation / sharpen texture mod.
descriptionHtml:
The Studded Armor is one of my favorite armors in game and fits Skyrim like a glove. But the texture on the armor was a bit low quality so i decided to do it from scratch. This was a personal mod but since it was a long project i decided to share with you guys.

This isn\'t a only recolor / saturation / sharpen texture mod.

 - Completely new high quality textures
 - Improved contrast/saturation
 - Doubled the resolution (1024x1024 -> 2048x2048)


*UPDATE*
 - Added the male version
 - Female updated


Installation:

Place the two files in:
for female -> Skyrim dir/Data/textures/armor/hide/f
for male -> Skyrim dir/Data/textures/armor/hide/m
To uninstall just delete them.

berna.
author: Bernardo Neves
